name: Avoid using Global Variables (C++)
description:
This rule searches for C++ code using global variables.
Constant are not taken into account in this rule.
output:
Associated to each C++ Method/Constructor/Destructor with violations, the Quality Rule provides: 
- the global variable used.
rationale: Global variables should be encapsulated in a class.
remediation: Create a static data member in the appropriate class to replace the global variable.
total: Number of C++ methods, constructors, and destructors

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Modularity and OO Encapsulation Conformity
